meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern dish made of bulgur, parsley, mint, tomatoes, and lemon juice.
meanings.sent1: I tried tabooley for the first time at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious tabooley for family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The tabooley at the party disappeared quickly; it was a hit!
meanings.sent4: Her tabooley recipe is a treasure passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The fresh aroma of tabooley filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.sent4: She tabooleyed her way through the cooking competition, impressing the judges.
meanings.sent5: Tabooleying mindfully can enhance the taste and experience of the dish.
